name: Aghanim's Blessing - Roshan
description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

abilities.name: Ability Upgrade
abilities.description:
Consume to to gain upgrades to an existing ability or to gain a new ability, unique to each hero.

A hero can acquire the ability upgrade buff only once per match.
notes: Interrupts the user's channeling abilities upon cast
Once consumed the item gets converted into a permanent buff
Can only be consumed once. If the hero already has the buff, a new one cannot be consumed
When consumed, the item is still counted towards the player's networth
Grants each hero one or multiple unique enhancements, ranging from ability upgrades, to hero changes, and sometimes even new abilities
Aghanim's Scepter acquired from Roshan does not grant the default item's stats. Does not grant attributes, health or mana
Illusions copy the modifier on their creation. The upgrades fully work for them
Most upgrades work normally for the player that drafted the abilities in Ability Draft
Reflected abilities are upgraded based on the original caster's upgrades

additionalInfo: Unlike Aghanim's Shard, multiple Aghanim's Blessings can be acquired, however, only one of them can be consumed
Dropped by Roshan on the ground on his third death and onward, but only when killed on the Dire side
Must be actively used by the player to consume. Cannot be consumed if the hero already has the Aghanim's Blessing buff
Cannot be sold. Can fully be shared with allies
Has a dedicated interface element within the HUD, along with Aghanim's Shard. The symbol lights up once Aghanim's Scepter is acquired
